short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension to help you practice a language by translating a web page content to your language level

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you learning a new language, but find online life in that language difficult? This chrome extension helps you keep learning while keeping your internet experience consistent with your language level. You no longer need to translate a web page to English. You can simply adjust the language level to whatever CEFR level (A1-C2) you're comfortable with. Give it a try and see how it can help you keep practicing your new language.

Usage:
- Install the extension
- Pin the extension to your browser
- Open a web page / refresh an existing page (not this one)
- Click on the extension
- Select a level
- Enjoy your more understandable content!
